welcome_message_body: Welcome to Niagara Falls, a charming city known for its breathtaking waterfalls and stunning natural beauty. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this amazing destination has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Niagara Falls International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at St Catharines Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at St Catharines Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buffalo Niagara International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is primarily used for domestic flights, with some international flights also departing from here.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is primarily used for domestic flights, with some international flights also departing from here.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
